# OpenAI

Integration with OpenAI models for text generation, embeddings, and other AI tasks.

*Documentation for specific functions in this module will be automatically generated from the codebase.*

## Usage

```python
import pixeltable as pxt

# Access OpenAI functions
pxt.functions.openai.chat_completions(...)
pxt.functions.openai.embeddings(...)
```

## Common Functions

This module typically includes functions for:
- Chat completions
- Text embeddings
- Image generation (DALL-E)
- Audio transcription and translation

See the [OpenAI API documentation](https://platform.openai.com/docs) for details on the underlying API.
